tree.name: Anfernee Simons
tree.tradeDescription: Bulls traded Nikola Vucevic and a 2027 2nd round pick (DEN own) to Celtics for Anfernee Simons and a 2026 2nd round pick (more favorable)

assetsGivenUp.name: Nikola Vucevic
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Bulls traded Wendell Carter Jr., Otto Porter Jr., and two 1st-round picks to Magic for Vucevic and Al-Farouq Aminu

assetsGivenUp.name: Wendell Carter Jr.
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 7th overall by Chicago Bulls from Duke in 2018 NBA Draft
